metadata.title: Support Black Equity - Tab for a Cause
metadata.ogTitle: Support Black Equity by Surfing the Web | Tab for a Cause
metadata.ogDescription: Open new tabs, raise money for charities supporting Black equity - for free
metadata.causeSpecificKeywords: charity, equity, Black, community, racial, educational, bail, pretrial, support, empowerment, African American, POC, WOC, HBCU, college, scholarship, university,systemic racism, extension, new tab, chrome, help, donation, raise money, money, easy, ways to donate, volunteer, internet, tab for a cause

landing.title: Support Black equity, every day
landing.subtitle: Every tab opened raises money for nonprofit organizations working toward Black empowerment and systemic reform.

charityIntro.title: Stop wasting tabs, start changing the world
charityIntro.subTitle: Little actions can have big results. With Tab for Black Equity, you can support charities uplifting Black communities just by opening more browser tabs.

steps.text: More young people going to college
Bail money for people who wouldn't otherwise have it

TFACIntro.title: Promote Black equity
TFACIntro.subtitle: Turn your daily habits into a positive change. Do good, feel good.
TFACIntro.img1Subtext: ###### Open new tabs on your browser.
TFACIntro.img3Subtext: ###### Help support systemic change and Black empowerment.

Mission.subtitleText: To make giving back easier than ever
Mission.bodyText: We believe everyone should make a difference for racial equity. Through our support of Thurgood Marshall College Fund and the Bail Project, you can be sure each tab you open is advancing Black equity.

Financials.title: Transparent Financials
Financials.text: Every tab makes an impact. Check out how much we've raised together.

smallEndorsements.endorsement: “FANTASTIC app that lets you do a lot of good things while doing your day to day work, studying for finals, or just surfing the web!”
“Raise money for charity by browsing the internet. Perfectly executed!”
“As a person who frequently enters wikipedia holes opening 20 tabs at a time.. its great to know that my procrastination can be of some use! Great app, brilliant idea”

“It's wonderful. Unobtrusive, useful, well designed, easy to navigate, and actually pretty fun! There is no reason to not have this extension. It has not affected performance and is never an inconvenience.”
“Love that this gives me, a fool with no money, a way to donate to charity. :)”
“It's a great way to raise money for charity when you don't have a lot of money ... Plus I can decide what charity to donate to, and do it on my own time. I love it!”
“Wonderful service that does great things for people in need, and all you have to do is click a button... Way better than the default chrome new tab page. So what do you have to lose?”
“Wonderful and thoughtful idea for an extension! Helping save the world one tab at a time.”
“Awesome way to give back while browsing, with absolutely no effort on your end!”
“Amazing extension. Such an awesome idea to use ad revenue from people's new tab to donate to charity. I'd rate 6 stars if I could.”

questions.question: How does opening tabs raise money for charity?
questions.answer: Every time you open a new tab, there will be a few ads in the corner of your new tab page. These ads generate the revenue that funds our charitable impact. And the best part? It's completely free!

questions.question: What type of images can I expect on my new tab page?
questions.answer: Each day our Tabbers are welcomed with breathtaking images captured by Black photographers. See the collection [here](https://unsplash.com/collections/l26tWeG5IJw/black-equity).

questions.question: What nonprofit does Tab for Black Equity support?
questions.answer: Tab for Black Equity supports [The Bail Project](https://bailproject.org/) and [Thurgood Marshall College Fund](https://www.tmcf.org/?gclid=CjwKCAiA5t-OBhByEiwAhR-hmzFLgTNoslU9vYn6NAWGC-XBM5zm2kOeuNLPQdo7yFMlEv0PixPbpRoCKEcQAvD_BwE). We are proud to support these incredible organizations that work to uplift their communities toward paths of empowerment and opportunity.

questions.question: How can I find out about new updates and announcements?
questions.answer: Stay in touch with us on social media! Follow us @tabforacause on [TikTok](https://www.tiktok.com/@tabforacause), [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/tabforacause/), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/TabForACause), and [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/TabForACause).

questions.question: This all sounds amazing! How else can I help?
questions.answer: Invite your friends and family to join in! Everybody who joins helps advance Black equity.
